item.title: Trump signs order gutting Department of Education
item.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to diminish the Department of Education at the White House on Thursday.

item.title: Judge calls DOJ's deportation flight submission 'woefully insufficient'
item.description: The Justice Department provided a submission in writing Thursday in response to U.S. District Judge James Boasberg's request for information.
